item.title: Siri Guru Granth Sahib ? Sikh Dharma International
item.description: The Siri Guru Granth Sahib is considered to be the Living Guru of the Sikhs. In its earthly form, it is 1430 pages of sacred teachings and songs.

item.description: The Guru Granth Sahib is the holy text of Sikhism. The Guru Granth Sahib is seen as more than a book, as it is believed to be the living Guru of the Sikhs.
